About This Property
Ideally located on Commonwealth Ave between Berkeley & Clarendon steps to Newbury St, Charles River and Public Garden, this entire floor 2+den/2-bath features an optimal open and flowing layout with front-facing living room and dining area overlooking the beautiful Commonwealth Mall. Granite/stainless kitchen with Sub Zero fridge and Viking stove. Living room with a beautiful original marble fireplace. Dining area can easily fit a table for four. Two south-facing bedrooms include the primary bedroom with generous closet space and full en suite bathroom with double sinks. Bonus den makes a great sitting area or work from home space. Central Air Conditioning. In Unit Laundry. One full tandem parking space located behind the building is an available for $350 extra. Rent includes water and sewer. One Month Broker Fee. 73135 627
84 Commonwealth Ave is an apartment community located in Suffolk County and the 02116 ZIP Code.
